column4: I'm truing to recove some data from an "well on the way to be broken" HD, but I can't seem to get the HD mounted in Ubuntu when I use the LiveCD. The PC has got XP on it, so I have to use the live CD.
Should be first or second in the menu (I've installed a couple of other programs so I can't tell for sure). It's got a hard disk next to it ;)
Oh, may not exist on hoary...not sure. Well, open up a terminal. I take it you have a non-SCSI disk ? How many partitions do you have ?
